attributes.action: school to really teach than worrying about our coats off &shirts being tucked in
attributes.additional_details:
most teenagers feel the same way as they have put on their snapchats.
if this petition gets 100,000 signatures all schools in britan should allow teenagers to use their coats to wear because my school is always literally cold. and the ‘shirts being tucked in’ dress code should be optional. also for phones to be allowed in classrooms.
attributes.background: secondary schools mostly in britain, don’t really teach anything because all they do is concern about our coats being off when we enter the building and our shirts being tucked in. and another issue is phones being used is a concern for teachers even for education use.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. you could raise your concerns with your school's governing body or senior leadership team.
